about_the_game:
Prepare for an out-of-this-world experience in Elite Comet, the cutting-edge comet simulation game that thrusts you into futuristic-style combat and light-speed chaos. With streamlined controls and a focus on physics-driven competition, Elite Comet is your ticket to an immersive gaming adventure.

In Elite Comet's Beta 0.1.0, get ready to engage in thrilling multiplayer battles like never before. Challenge yourself and your friends as you face off against 10 AIs or 10 fellow players in intense cosmic warfare. Customize the game to your liking by adjusting health and lives for all participants, creating a truly unique and adrenaline-pumping experience.

Dive into the chaos of space battles, where every decision matters and every shot counts. Will you emerge victorious in this interstellar arena, or will you be left floating in the cosmic dust? Your journey begins now in Elite Comet Beta 0.1.0. Strap in and prepare for an electrifying ride through the stars.

Dive into the chaos of space battles, where every decision matters and every shot counts. Will you emerge victorious in this interstellar arena, or will you be left floating in the cosmic dust? Your journey begins now in Elite Comet Beta 0.1.0. Strap in and prepare for an electrifying ride through the stars.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: N/A
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, ATI 7950 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Elite Comet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or Newer
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • Additional Notes: NA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NA
  • Additional Notes: NA

supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
